title: Quick Planner
description: Keep track of tasks that are incomplete, due soon, or were left behind on days where you were feeling particularly... ambitious.

title: Prioritization
description:
An adaptation of the Eisenhower Matrix,
tasks are labeled important, urgent, both,
or neither so your priorities are always clear

title: Daily Review
description: Mindfully end each day by reviewing wins and deciding if leftover items should be marked as done, won't do, or be rescheduled

title: Notes & Journal
description: A card component has a figure, a body part, and inside body there are title and actions parts and a third line too
